comment.author: 66745221@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/ruttolo/14130592]

Honestly, was that I wanted to delete this  photo from my archive, now that I found your beautiful photos of the time I keep it in your honor and to give a comparison between the two epochs.

if you want to locate your photos you can take inspiration from my photo, it's very precise.

Thanks you

Sinceramente era una foto che volevo eliminare dal mio archivio, ora che ho trovato la vostra bellissima foto d'epoca la tengo in vostro onore e per poter dare un confronto tra le due epoche.

se voleste localizzare la vostra foto potete prendere spunto dalla mia è molto precisa.

Grazie

comment._content:
Thanks EOLO -- I love your then-and-now picture. It's so amazing how little has changed.
Deb Wythe
